## Type of Change

- [ ] `feat` — New feature
- [ ] `fix` — Bug fix
- [ ] `docs` — Documentation
- [ ] `refactor` — Code refactoring
- [ ] `test` — Tests
- [ ] `chore` — Maintenance (deps, config, CI)

## Testing

<!-- How was this tested? -->

- [ ] `composer test` passes
- [ ] `composer analyze` passes
- [ ] Manually tested in WordPress admin

## Checklist

- [ ] Branch follows naming conventions (`feat/`, `fix/`, `docs/`, etc.)
- [ ] Commits follow [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/)
- [ ] No sensitive data (API keys, credentials) included
